Description: Classic flashcard system with 4 modes: Reading (flip cards), Listening (type what you hear), Speaking (pronunciation check), Writing (translate). The gold standard reference implementation.

Casino betting game. English word on top, 4 translation choices below. Bet all your chips on ONE answer. Wrong = lose everything. Right = play baccarat hand with 65/35 player odds. High stakes dopamine rush.
Navigate a maze by answering vocabulary questions. Correct answer opens the path forward, wrong answer hits a wall or spawns enemy. Each room has a multiple choice challenge.
Zombies approach from the screen. Each zombie has a word floating above it. Type the word correctly to shoot and kill the zombie before it reaches you. Wave-based survival.
Space Invaders clone. Aliens descend with words attached. Type the word to fire a laser and destroy the alien. Faster typing = higher combo multiplier. Boss aliens need longer phrases.
Martial arts training. Sensei speaks a word, you repeat it. Score determines your belt rank. Chain perfect pronunciations for combo multiplier. Unlock new dojos (harder words).
Slot machine with 3 reels: Target word, Translation 1, Translation 2. Pull lever, if translation matches target you win coins. Spend coins on hints or skip hard words. Gambling psychology.
5-card draw poker but cards are vocabulary words. Must correctly identify translations to keep cards. Better hand = bigger payout. Bluffing element with timed pressure.
Roulette wheel with 8 translation options. Ball spins, you bet on correct translation before it lands. Inside bets (single answer) pay 8:1. Outside bets (2-3 options) pay less.
Cards are vocabulary words with point values. Hit to get more words, but must translate each correctly to keep points. Bust if wrong translation. Beat the dealer to 21.
Racing game. Car accelerates based on typing speed. Type words that appear on road signs to boost. Typos cause slowdown. Finish line requires certain word count.
Guitar Hero style. Words scroll down lanes. Type them in rhythm with the music beat. Perfect timing = bonus points. Miss = combo break. Multiple difficulty tracks.
Tetris blocks are vocabulary words. Type the word correctly to rotate/drop faster. Stack translations to clear lines. Wrong answer = block drops uncontrolled.
Snake game where eating correct translations makes snake grow. Wrong answers make snake shrink. Walls are vocabulary questions - pass through by answering correctly.
4x4 grid of face-down cards. Flip two - if target word matches its translation, remove pair. Classic memory game with vocabulary twist. Timed for challenge.
Memory match but with pronunciation. Flip card, say the word aloud. If pronunciation matches the hidden translation card, it's a match. Audio-based memory.
Chain words together. Each domino has target word on one end, translation on other. Match ends to build chain. Longer chain = more points. Multiplayer possible.
5x5 bingo card with translations. Caller announces target words via TTS. Mark correct translation. First to complete pattern wins. BINGO!
Answer in the form of a question. Given translation, must provide target word. Categories by theme (food, travel, etc). Daily doubles for bonus points.
RPG dungeon exploration. Enemies attack with vocabulary challenges. Multiple choice for defense (block), typing for attack (sword), pronunciation for magic spells.
Adventure game where dialogue options are vocabulary choices. Choose correct translation to advance story. Wrong choices lead to bad endings. Branching narrative.
Giant boss monsters with health bars. Type words rapidly to deal damage. Boss attacks require multiple choice defense. Final blow needs perfect pronunciation.
Map with buried treasure. Dig spots have vocabulary locks. Solve multiple choice to dig. Find treasure chests that require typing passwords. Voice-activated secret doors.
Shoot hoops by answering vocabulary. Distance determines difficulty. 3-pointer = hard word. Free throw = easy word. Shot clock pressure. Season mode with stats.
Penalty kicks and saves. Kicker types word to shoot. Goalie picks direction via multiple choice. Fast typing = powerful shot. Trading card team building.
12 rounds against AI opponent. Jabs = quick multiple choice. Hooks = medium typing challenges. Uppercuts = pronunciation combos. Health bar depletes on wrong answers.
18 holes. Each stroke is a vocabulary challenge. Par determined by word difficulty. Type accurately for straight drive. Slice/hook on typos. Putting is pronunciation precision.
Waves of zombies. Type to shoot (pistol), multiple choice to reload, pronunciation to call airstrikes. Survive as many nights as possible. Permadeath mode.
Locked in a room. Solve vocabulary puzzles to find keys. Multiple choice for combination locks. Typing for computer passwords. Voice commands for smart locks.
Enemies march toward your base. Place towers that fire when you type words. Upgrade towers with multiple choice bonuses. Special pronunciation-activated superweapons.
Competition format. Hear word via TTS, type the spelling. Get definition (translation) as hint. Elimination rounds. Leaderboard. Daily/weekly competitions.
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire format. Multiple choice with lifelines (50/50, phone friend, ask audience). Money ladder with checkpoints. High tension.
Transform one word into another by changing one letter at a time. Each step must be valid vocabulary word. Fewest steps wins. Daily puzzle format.
Match-3 with vocabulary tiles. Swap adjacent translations to match with target word. Cascades give combo bonuses. Level-based progression with obstacles.
Bubbles float up with words. Pop matching translation pairs before they escape. Chain pops for bonus. Power-ups from streak performance. Endless mode.
Plant vocabulary seeds. Water them by answering questions correctly. Harvest grown words for coins. Seasons change difficulty. Decorative farm building.
Build a city by completing vocabulary challenges. Each building unlocked by mastering word pack. Typing for construction speed. Pronunciation for citizen happiness.
Real-time 1v1 vocabulary battle. Both players get same word. First to type correctly wins point. Best of 5 rounds. ELO ranking system.
Bracket elimination. 64 players. Each match is typing speed competition on same vocabulary pack. Winner advances. Spectator mode. Prize pool.
One new word pack per day. Score based on accuracy and speed. Global leaderboard resets daily. Streak bonuses for consecutive days. FOMO engagement.
Cast line into vocabulary pond. Fish bite when you see word. Reel in by typing translation. Bigger fish = harder words. Collect rare species. Aquarium display.
Recipe book with dish names. Gather ingredients (vocabulary words) by answering questions. Combine correctly to cook dish. Timer pressure. Restaurant progression.
Murder mystery narrative. Interrogate suspects using vocabulary. Multiple choice for questions. Type to take notes. Pronounce evidence to voice-analyze. Solve the case.
Fruit Ninja clone. Words fly across screen. Slice correct translation pairs with swipe gesture. Avoid slicing wrong pairs. Combo multiplier. Zen and arcade modes.
Archery target practice. Aim by selecting translation zone. Draw bow by typing word. Release and pronounce for accuracy boost. Bullseye requires all three perfect.
Three-stage race. Stage 1: Multiple choice sprint. Stage 2: Typing cycling. Stage 3: Pronunciation marathon. Combined time determines winner. Olympic format.
Stranded on island. Hunt food (typing), build shelter (multiple choice), signal rescue (pronunciation). Day/night cycle. Weather events. Story progression.
Temple Run style. Run through word obstacles. Swipe to correct translation path. Type to boost over gaps. Pronounce to activate shields. Distance-based scoring.
Pinball machine with vocabulary bumpers. Type to activate flippers. Hit word targets for points. Pronunciation activates multiball. Combo shots for jackpot.
Asteroids clone. Type word on asteroid to shoot it. Larger asteroids split into smaller words. UFO bosses need multiple choice to identify weak point first.
Words fall from sky like rain. Move basket to catch correct translations. Wrong catches remove lives. Speed increases over time. Peaceful aesthetic.
Explore spooky mansion. Ghosts attack with vocabulary riddles. Type exorcism words. Pronounce incantations. Collect artifacts by solving multiple choice puzzles.
Sail the seas. Naval battles require typing cannon fire. Board enemy ships with multiple choice combat. Pronounce to rally crew. Treasure maps with vocab puzzles.
TTS sings a word/phrase slowly. You must pronounce it back in time with the rhythm. Pitch and timing matter. Party game potential. Score based on accuracy.
Hear a word, repeat it. Then hear two words, repeat both. Chain grows longer. Memory + pronunciation combo. Leaderboard for longest chain achieved.
Telephone game solo. TTS says word. You pronounce. System compares. See how much drift over 10 repetitions. Teaches self-correction through feedback.
Difficult pronunciation phrases. Speed and accuracy scored. Difficulty tiers from beginner to master. Daily challenges. Mouth workout with vocabulary learning.
RTS game controlled by voice. Say vocabulary commands to move units. Pronunciation accuracy affects unit efficiency. Multiple choice for strategic decisions.
AI opponent debates topic. You must pronounce counterarguments. Multiple choice for selecting debate strategy. Typing for real-time fact presentation. Judge scoring.
Mix vocabulary tracks. Type words to add beats. Pronounce to add vocals. Multiple choice to select song structure. Create and share vocabulary songs.
Dig site excavation. Brush away dirt by typing. Identify artifacts via multiple choice. Record findings by pronunciation. Historical narrative progression.
Manage space station systems. Type commands for engineering. Multiple choice for crew management. Pronounce for comms with Earth. Crisis events test all skills.
Pandemic style. Vocabulary virus spreads across world map. Type to research cure. Multiple choice for resource allocation. Pronounce to communicate with labs.
Dance Dance Revolution but for speaking. Words appear on beat markers. Pronounce in rhythm. Combo chains for staying on beat. Dance routines with vocabulary.
Bid on rare vocabulary words with earned coins. Type fast to place bids. Multiple choice appraises word value. Pronunciation unlocks auction house levels. Collection game.
Pokemon-style collection. Catch monsters by typing their names. Battle using multiple choice attacks. Pronounce to command special moves. Evolution through mastery.
Play as lawyer. Type objections rapidly. Multiple choice for legal strategy. Pronounce closing arguments for jury persuasion. Win cases to progress career.
Medical simulation. Diagnose patients via multiple choice symptoms. Type prescriptions. Pronounce patient instructions. Specialization paths (cardiology = body parts).
Pure speed challenge. See word, type translation as fast as possible. No lives, just clock. Personal best tracking. Global leaderboards. Minimal UI.
Peaceful mode. No pressure, no timer. Vocabulary meditation. Type words slowly. Hear pronunciation. Match translations thoughtfully. Ambient music. Relaxation focus.
Solitaire card game with vocabulary cards. Stack by translation relationship instead of suit/number. Multiple valid arrangements. Time bonus for speed.
Classic hangman. Guess letters by typing. Wrong guesses build gallows. Translation shown as hint. Category selection. Daily words. Simple but effective.
Anagram puzzle. Letters of target word scrambled. Unscramble by typing. Translation as hint. Timer for bonus points. Multiple difficulty levels.
Sentence with missing word. Type the correct vocabulary word. Translation and context clues provided. Grammar integration. Sentence completion focus.
Speed run through flashcard deck. Multiple choice only. See how fast you can clear 50 cards. Mistakes add time penalty. Leaderboard by pack.
Voice-based fighting game. Characters fight when you pronounce words. Better pronunciation = stronger attacks. Combo system for word chains. Fighting game aesthetics.
First person maze navigation. Walls have vocabulary words. Say the translation aloud to open doors. Wrong pronunciation = maze reconfigures. Escape the labyrinth.
Metal Gear style stealth game. Guards speak in target language. Multiple choice to understand their patrol routes. Type passwords on terminals. Pronounce codes to allies.
F1 racing with vocabulary pit stops. Type to refuel. Multiple choice for tire selection. Pronounce to communicate with pit crew. Season championship mode.
Mini-game collection. Chop ingredients by typing. Select correct items via multiple choice. Pronounce dish names for presentation score. Recipe unlock progression.
Business simulation. Build vocabulary empire. Multiple choice for business decisions. Type contracts. Pronounce to negotiate deals. Money management with learning.
Type to the beat of music. Words appear on music staff. Hit keys in rhythm. Miss timing = miss note. Song unlocks based on vocabulary mastery.
Reality show format. Vocabulary tribal councils. Vote out wrong answers via multiple choice. Type to win immunity challenges. Pronounce for alliance building.
Idle/clicker game. Click generates vocabulary points. Upgrades automate learning. Multiple choice for prestige resets. Typing for active bonus. Low effort, high retention.
Battle royale with vocabulary. 100 words enter, 1 survives. Eliminate words by correctly using them. Storm closes on wrong answers. Last word standing wins.
Science simulation. Experiment with word combinations. Type hypotheses. Multiple choice for element selection. Pronounce to record findings. Discovery-based learning.
Plan and execute vocabulary heists. Multiple choice for planning phase. Type to hack security. Pronounce to coordinate team. Stealth or action approach.
Create poems using vocabulary. Multiple choice for rhyme selection. Type to compose lines. Pronounce for reading performance. Share creations. Art + learning.
Weather forecast game. Predict vocabulary weather by multiple choice. Type storm warnings. Pronounce emergency broadcasts. Accuracy tracking over time.
Rally words back and forth. Type to return serve. Multiple choice for strategic placement. Pronounce to call plays. Multiplayer potential.
Wrestling match with vocabulary moves. Type to grapple. Multiple choice for counter moves. Pronounce to taunt and boost morale. Championship belt system.
Free running through word-covered city. Type words on walls to wall-run. Multiple choice at intersections. Pronounce to activate boost. Style points system.
